files.description: Enhanced artifact gate/validator script with preflight environment checks, Docker availability validation, and path diagnostics to prevent container-loss failures.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:gate/artifact_gate.py
DIR_STATE:["gate/artifact_gate.py", "gate/verify_artifacts.py"]
SUMMARY: Wrote artifact_gate.py with preflight environment, Docker, and path diagnostics to fail fast and prevent container-loss test runs.

FILE_WRITTEN:gate/artifact_gate.py
DIR_STATE:["gate/artifact_gate.py", "gate/verify_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Updated artifact_gate.py with fast-fail preflight environment/Docker/path diagnostics to prevent early container-loss failures.

files.description: Shared diagnostics module that collects and formats environment, Docker runtime, filesystem, and PATH/PYTHONPATH details for gate scripts to log and include in reports.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:gate/env_diagnostics.py
DIR_STATE:["gate/artifact_gate.py", "gate/env_diagnostics.py", "gate/verify_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Added gate/env_diagnostics.py to collect and format environment, Docker, filesystem, and PATH/PYTHONPATH diagnostics for gate scripts.

files.description: Utility module that runs lightweight Docker health checks (daemon reachable, image pull/run sanity, resource/permission hints) and emits actionable troubleshooting output.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:gate/docker_healthcheck.py
DIR_STATE:["gate/artifact_gate.py", "gate/docker_healthcheck.py", "gate/env_diagnostics.py", "gate/verify_artifacts.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a lightweight, stdlib-only Docker healthcheck module that reports daemon reachability, PATH/socket/context diagnostics, and optional run-sanity output for gate scripts.

files.description: Path probing helpers that validate expected project directories/files, resolve symlinks, detect missing mounts, and print canonical paths used by validators.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:gate/path_probe.py
DIR_STATE:["gate/artifact_gate.py", "gate/docker_healthcheck.py", "gate/env_diagnostics.py", "gate/path_probe.py", "gate/verify_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Implemented path probing helpers to canonicalize paths, detect symlinks/missing mounts, and produce formatted/json diagnostics for gate validators.

FILE_WRITTEN:gate/path_probe.py
DIR_STATE:["gate/artifact_gate.py", "gate/docker_healthcheck.py", "gate/env_diagnostics.py", "gate/path_probe.py", "gate/verify_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Implemented gate/path_probe.py with canonical path resolution, expected-path validation, mount suspicion heuristics, and human/JSON diagnostics output.

files.description: Troubleshooting report documenting the 'container lost after testing 0/50 files' failure, added checks/diagnostics, reproduction notes, and post-fix stability confirmation steps.

missionDescription: Diagnose and fix the 'container lost after testing 0/50 files' execution failure by adding environment checks + path diagnostics to the existing gate/validator scripts (artifact_gate.py and related tooling) and re-run to confirm stability; write a troubleshooting report to runtime/_build/reports/container_stability.md.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Multiple CodeExecutionAgent runs aborted with container loss; until stabilized, validation and analysis cannot reliably run, keeping execution results at zero.
